title: The Name field accepts all invalid values

steps.one: Entering letters in a different case in the middle of a word
steps.three: Entering code characters and special characters, including currency symbols

Expected result: at each attempt to enter invalid data, the system will display an error The name field is filled incorrectly, the system will not allow to the next step and will not register the user
Actual result: The Name field takes all invalid values at all steps, the system registers the user

title: Поле Фамилия принимает все невалидные значения

steps.one: Entering letters in a different case in the middle of a word
steps.three: Entering code characters and special characters, including currency symbols

Expected result: at each attempt to enter invalid data, the system will display an error The last name field is filled incorrectly, the system will not allow to the next step and will not register the user
Actual result: The last name field takes all invalid values at all steps, the system registers the user
